硝

Значения

Селитра

Мнемоника

Селитра — с виду как камень 石 и состоит из похожих 肖 друг на друга кристаллов.
purpleculture_pinyin:
xiāo
saltpeter; to tan (leather)
селитра; дубить (кожа)
rtega_mnemonic:
硝硝RSsaltpeter, niter, tan
  • mineral that's small part 肖 of a stone 石
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 肖 indicates the sound; 石 (mineral) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
硝烟 [ xiāo yān ]: smoke (from guns)
硝酸 [ xiāo suān ]: nitric acid
硝石 [ xiāo shí ]: niter; saltpeter; potassium nitrate KNO3
硝酸甘油 [ xiāo suān gān yóu ]: nitroglycerine
硝化甘油 [ xiāo huà gān yóu ]: nitroglycerine
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 石 [ shí ] stone, rock, mineral
    • 肖 [ xiào ] to resemble, to look like; to be like
heisig_constituent: nitrate, stone, rock, resemblance, spark, candle, small, little, moon, month, flesh, part of the body
heisig_story: The word nitrate should immediately suggest a beaker of nitric acid, which, as every high-school chemistry student knows, can eat its way through some pretty tough substances. Here we imagine pouring it over a rock and watching the sparks fly as it bores a hole through the rock.
myStory: эксперимент, камень на столе, ты приготовился, подносишь свечку
koohiiStory1: That stone has sparks coming out of it! Someone must have poured nitrate acid on it.
koohiiStory2: Salpetre is the common name for Nitrate coming from Latin "sal petrae" or stone salt. It is also a component of gun powder so including a candle in this kanji can be quite explosive!
Ru_AutoNotes: Селитра — название для минералов, содержащих нитраты (NO3) щелочных, щелочноземельных металлов (в том числе их кристаллогидратов) и аммония.
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 硫 (リュウ сера).

Ru_Radicals: 口 (рот), 尚 (ещё), 月 (месяц), 石 (камень)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: to make a stone (石) resemble (肖) a bullet you need nitrate
humanum_full_description_en:
" Nitrogen ", from the sound of " stone " and " Xiao ", the name of the mineral, is a general term for minerals such as Glauber's salt, saltpeter, and simple salt. " Nitrogen " can be used as medicine. "Zhengzitong. "Stone Department": "Nitrogen, medicinal stone. There are seven kinds of nitrate in prescriptions: simple nitrate. Glauber's salt, nitrate, and horse teeth are slow. Saltpeter, weathered nitrate, and xuanming powder are more gentle. It is used for soups such as stomach and qi The awn does not need to be simple, but the awn is slow in nature and sharp in simplicity. It is suitable for the real, but forbidden for the imaginary." Nitrogen is also the raw material for making gunpowder. Zhao Yi's Oubei Poems. "Nineteen Ancient Poems": "The gunpowder made from sulphurous firewood has no advantage in the world." It means that once gunpowder made of saltpeter, sulphur and other materials is available, the sharpest traditional weapons can hardly be matched! " Nitrogen " is originally " elimination ", see " elimination ".

The example in the ancient book is the twelfth of Li He's "South Garden" in the Tang Dynasty: "New dragon eggs in Songxi Heishui, and old horse teeth in Guidong." Chapter 59 of "Dream of Red Mansions": "While washing up, Xiang Yunyin said: " Both cheeks are itchy, for fear of peach tinea." Because I asked Baochai for some rose nitrate."

" Nitro " as a verb means tanning leather with nitrate or glauber's salt to make the leather soft. Song Yingxing of the Ming Dynasty "Heavenly Creations. Qiu: "The old sheepskin is tanned into fur, and the quality of the fur is obsessed." For example, Chapter 92 of "Journey to the West": "A wall is called the butcher, and the rhinoceros skin is cooked and dried to make armor." "The Romance" Chapter 26: "Let's say that Bigan tanned the fox skin, creating a robe, waiting for the winter to enter the robe."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of stone, the name of the mineral is a general term for minerals such as Glauber's salt, saltpeter, and simple salt.
humanum_full_description:
「硝」，從「石」，「肖」聲，礦物名，乃芒硝、硝石、樸硝等礦物的泛稱。「硝」可入藥。《正字通．石部》：「硝，藥石也。方書硝七種：樸硝力緊。芒硝、英硝、馬牙硝力緩。硝石、風化硝、鉉明粉更緩。謂胃、承氣等湯用芒不用樸，以芒性緩，朴性銳利。實者宜之，虛者禁之。」「硝」也是製造火藥的原料。清代趙翼《甌北詩鈔．古詩十九首》：「硝磺製火藥，世乃無利兵。」意謂硝石、硫磺等材料製成的火藥一經面世，最鋒利的傳統兵刃亦再難以匹敵！「硝」本作「消」，參見「消」。

　　古書中的例子如唐代李賀〈南園〉之十二：「松溪黑水新龍卵，桂洞生硝舊馬牙。」《紅樓夢》第59回：「一面梳洗，湘雲因說：『兩腮作癢，恐又犯了桃花癬。』因問寶釵要些薔薇硝擦。」

　　「硝」作動詞表示用樸硝、芒硝等鞣製皮革，使皮革變軟，又稱「硝熟」。明代宋應星《天工開物．裘》：「其老大羊皮，硝熟為裘，裘質癡重。」如《西遊記》第92回：「一壁廂叫屠子宰剝，犀牛之皮硝熟燻乾，製造鎧甲。」《封神演義》第26回：「且說比干將狐狸皮硝熟，造成一件袍襖，只候嚴冬進袍。」
humanum_short_description: 從石肖聲，礦物名，乃芒硝、硝石、樸硝等礦物的泛稱。

「 硝 」，從「 石 」，「 肖 」聲，礦物名，乃芒硝、硝石、樸硝等礦物的泛稱。「 硝 」可入藥。《正字通．石部》：「硝，藥石也。方書硝七種：樸硝力緊。芒硝、英硝、馬牙硝力緩。硝石、風化硝、鉉明粉更緩。謂胃、承氣等湯用芒不用樸，以芒性緩，朴性銳利。實者宜之，虛者禁之。」「 硝 」也是製造火藥的原料。清代趙翼《甌北詩鈔．古詩十九首》：「硝磺製火藥，世乃無利兵。」意謂硝石、硫磺等材料製成的火藥一經面世，最鋒利的傳統兵刃亦再難以匹敵！「 硝 」本作「 消 」，參見「 消 」。 古書中的例子如唐代李賀〈南園〉之十二：「松溪黑水新龍卵，桂洞生硝舊馬牙。」《紅樓夢》第59回：「一面梳洗，湘雲因說：『兩腮作癢，恐又犯了桃花癬。』因問寶釵要些薔薇硝擦。」 「 硝 」作動詞表示用樸硝、芒硝等鞣製皮革，使皮革變軟，又稱「硝熟」。明代宋應星《天工開物．裘》：「其老大羊皮，硝熟為裘，裘質癡重。」如《西遊記》第92回：「一壁廂叫屠子宰剝，犀牛之皮硝熟燻乾，製造鎧甲。」《封神演義》第26回：「且說比干將狐狸皮硝熟，造成一件袍襖，只候嚴冬進袍。」
" Nitrogen", from the sound of " stone" and " Xiao", the name of the mineral, is a general term for minerals such as Glauber's salt, saltpeter, and simple salt. " Nitrogen" can be used as medicine. "Zhengzitong. "Stone Department": "Nitrogen, medicinal stone. There are seven kinds of nitrate in prescriptions: simple nitrate. Glauber's salt, nitrate, and horse teeth are slow. Saltpeter, weathered nitrate, and xuanming powder are more gentle. It is used for soups such as stomach and qi The awn does not need to be simple, but the awn is slow in nature and sharp in simplicity. It is suitable for the real, but forbidden for the imaginary." Nitrogen is also the raw material for making gunpowder. Zhao Yi's Oubei Poems. "Nineteen Ancient Poems": "The gunpowder made from sulphurous firewood has no advantage in the world." It means that once gunpowder made of saltpeter, sulphur and other materials is available, the sharpest traditional weapons can hardly be matched! " Nitrogen" is originally " elimination", see " elimination". The example in the ancient book is the twelfth of Li He's "South Garden" in the Tang Dynasty: "New dragon eggs in Songxi Heishui, and old horse teeth in Guidong." Chapter 59 of "Dream of Red Mansions": "While washing up, Xiang Yunyin said: " Both cheeks are itchy, for fear of peach tinea." Because I asked Baochai for some rose nitrate." " Nitro" as a verb means tanning leather with nitrate or glauber's salt to make the leather soft. Song Yingxing of the Ming Dynasty "Heavenly Creations. Qiu: "The old sheepskin is tanned into fur, and the quality of the fur is obsessed." For example, Chapter 92 of "Journey to the West": "A wall is called the butcher, and the rhinoceros skin is cooked and dried to make armor." "The Romance" Chapter 26: "Let's say that Bigan tanned the fox skin, creating a robe, waiting for the winter to enter the robe."

硝字的基本解释

硝
xiāo
一些矿物盐的泛称：硝石。芒硝。
用朴硝或芒硝加黄米面等处理毛皮，使皮板儿柔软：硝皮子。

Nitrate
xiāo
General term for some mineral salts: saltpeter. Glauber's salt.
Treat the fur with plain glass or Glauber's salt and yellow rice noodles to make the skin soft: tanned leather.

Селитра — название для минералов, содержащих нитраты (NO3) щелочных, щелочноземельных металлов (в том числе их кристаллогидратов) и аммония.
